caption.p: Probability of occurrence of Long‐billed Dowitcher during mid‐migration in 2041–2070 (forecast) based on five general circulation models ( GCM) from CMIP5, Representative Concentration Pathway 8.5, and the ensemble of the GCMs. The yellow‐to‐brown color ramp corresponds to small‐to‐large probability values. The diagrams indicate the position of GCM relative to changes in precipitation and temperature with wetter models appearing as an X above the horizontal line, warmer models as an X to the right of the vertical line, and the average model as an X in the center
